page.title: 02HARDWICK-THE GOOD & THE BAD.
page.content: Problems and privileges obviously go hand in hand for the residents of such an area. The majority bask in the {beauty}of the surrounding countryside, appreciating greatly the{tranquility and the{freshness.}However, heavy snow in winter could mean acute{transport {difficulties}which is intensified by the almost total{lack of amenities. However, the privilege of having such a wide variety of{wildlife}almost upon their doorsteps, the beautiful {landscape,}the{privacy}and (usually) easy access to the{motorway}means for many that the problems of winter,the lack of facilities, the droves of {visitors}that flock to the area each year and the incessant drone of the motorway{traffic}pale into insignificance.
